front.title: IEEE Trial-Use Design Guide for Wood Transmission Structures

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The standard covers the structural design and application of wood transmission structures. The guide includes definitions, application of loads, structure application, characteristics of natural wood and laminated wood members, design stresses, fabrication of laminated wood members, connections, nonwood members, erection and framing, and quality assurance.<>
